page.title: 17The Village Pub(1)
page.content: My Dad,Walter Taylor ,is the landlord of the Walmer Bridge Inn. The pub is nearly a hundred years old. It is open every day.The licensing hours are Mondays to Saturdays - 11.30a.m. to 3.00p.m. and 5.30p.m. to 11.00p.m. and Sundays -12..00 until 2.00p.m. and 7.00p.m. until 10.30p.m. The pub is owned by the Greenall Whitley brewery. The most popular drink is bitter beer. We have a cellar to keep barrels of beer in.Altogether we keep about three hundred gallons of beer at any one time. Like most pubs these days we serve food as well as drink but it does not make as much money. We serve food at lunchtime from 12.00 until 2.00 but we don't serve any on Sunday. My dad has seven part-time staff and the busiest time of the week is Friday evening.(Contd.)
